definition: to dodge/to duck out of the way/to beat it/shaken (by a fall)/to sprain/to pull a muscle/lightning/spark/a flash/to flash (across one's mind)/to leave behind/(Internet slang) (of a display of affection) "dazzlingly" saccharine
to exist/to deposit/to store/to keep/to survive
USB flash drive/jump drive/thumb drive/memory stick

sentences.english: "Readout" mode for NAND memory chips which have a huge count of bit errors.
sentences.chinese: 新的读出模式为了闪存芯片位错误有大的计算。

sentences.english: U disk, or USB (Universal Serial Bus) flash drive, is a small type of hard drive.
sentences.chinese: 盘，也叫USB闪存盘，是一种小型的硬盘。

sentences.english: Instead of a hard disk, the Jhai PC relies on flash-memory chips to store its data.
sentences.chinese: Jhai电脑没有硬盘，而是依靠闪存芯片存储资料。

sentences.english: Improvements in the speed of flash drives.
sentences.chinese: 闪存驱动器速度方面的改进。

sentences.english: But South Korean companies, led by Samsung, are also large producers of flash memory.
sentences.chinese: 但是以三星为首的韩国企业也是闪存的一大生产商。

sentences.english: This minimizes the risk of "wear-out" that is common to less advanced Flash devices.
sentences.chinese: 这可以减小低端闪存设备常见的“磨损”风险。

sentences.english: Unique flash drive will inspire you to cure computer viruses.
sentences.chinese: 能鼓舞你战胜计算机病毒的独特闪存盘。

sentences.english: The company also rolled out some even faster flash cards, too.
sentences.chinese: 公司还生产出大量更为快捷的闪存卡。

sentences.english: SSDs is like using compact flash or SD cards.
sentences.chinese: 固态硬盘就像紧凑型闪存或SD卡。

sentences.english: Kingston has just announced that they have taken a step further for the storage capacity of its flash drive.
sentences.chinese: 金士顿已经宣布他们的闪存容量有了巨大突破。

sentences.english: The company will comprise the flash memory units of Intel and STMicro.
sentences.chinese: 新公司由英特尔和意法半导体的闪存部门组成。

sentences.english: Portfolio and experimental Flash site of Ben James aka highrise design.
sentences.chinese: 组合和实验闪存奔雅各又名高层设计网站。

sentences.english: I am not sure about when the upgrade will be releashed , or the new flashcard will be releashed .
sentences.chinese: 我不知道什么时候升级将欧，或新的闪存卡将出来。

sentences.english: Photographers will love this creative film roll shaped flash drive.
sentences.chinese: 摄像师会喜欢这款有创意的胶卷型闪存盘。

sentences.english: The invention relates to a data write-in method, which is suitable for a flash memory.
sentences.chinese: 一种数据写入方法，其适用于闪存。

sentences.english: Analysis of The Corporate Annual Report: with flashcards & tests.
sentences.chinese: 包含专业测试和闪存卡的商业教育课程。

definition: three major stars of the Three Stars 參宿|参宿[Shen1 xiu4] Chinese constellation/the belt of Orion/three spirits 福[fu2], 祿|禄[lu4], and 壽|寿[shou4] associated with the Three Stars 參宿|参宿[Shen1 xiu4] Chinese constellation
Sanxing or Sanhsing township in Yilan county 宜蘭縣|宜兰县[Yi2 lan2 xian4], Taiwan/Samsung (South Korean electronics company)
USB flash drive/jump drive/thumb drive/memory stick
